attributes.action: Request that Michel Platini would mind his own business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since his inception into his new role as president of UEFA, Michel Platini has gone out of his way to revolutionise football, when what he has actually done is poked his large French nose in where it is certainly not wanted.

We(well I) would like the Prime Minister to impose a ban on le big nose discussing anything to do with English football in a place where English football fans may end up reading it.

Pipe down Platini

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
